A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First off\, I’m a die hard Star Wars fan... Jar Jar Binks is leaping for joy that he is no longer in the worst Star Wars movie. No character development. Too much forced humor—Disney please stop this it’s getting out of hand\, this isn’t marvel. Trying way too hard to copy things from the original movies in a bad way. Really the only rebel base you could think of would be something that resembles Hoth? white sand instead of snow? Really? Jar jar binks would have made this movie better.
